TableInfo.QueryValue: DELETE TRACKLIST WHERE AFACCTNO=:AFACCTNO AND SYMBOL=:SYMBOL
SELECT COUNT(*) NUMSYMBOL FROM TRACKLIST WHERE AFACCTNO=:AFACCTNO AND SYMBOL=:SYMBOL
SELECT * FROM TRACKLIST WHERE AFACCTNO=:AFACCTNO ORDER BY SYMBOL
select AUTOID,REGSMS from cfregalert where STATUS='A' AND REGISTERID=:L_CUSTID

select A.SYMBOL,B.* FROM (SELECT F.SYMBOL,F.AUTOID FROM cfregalert reg,cfaltertfile F where F.REGPROFILEID=reg.autoid AND reg.registerid=:REGISTERID)A, (SELECT MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'LASTPRICEGT',C.alvalue,'')) LASTPRICEGT, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'LASTPRICELT',C.alvalue,'')) LASTPRICELT, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'TOTALQTTYGT',C.alvalue,'')) TOTALQTTYGT, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'TOTALTRADEVAULEGT',C.alvalue,'')) TOTALTRADEVAULEGT, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'LASTPRICEVSTOP',C.alvalue,'')) LASTPRICEVSTOP, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'LASTPRICEGTAVG',C.alvalue,'')) LASTPRICEGTAVG_1, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'LASTPRICELTAVG',C.alvalue,'')) LASTPRICELTAVG_2, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'TOTALQTTYGTTOP',C.alvalue,'')) TOTALQTTYGTTOP, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'TOTALQTTYGTAVG',C.alvalue,'')) TOTALQTTYGTAVG, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'ADX',C.alvalue,'')) ADX, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'DIDFF',C.alvalue,'')) DIDFF, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'MACD',C.alvalue,'')) MACD, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'MACDH',C.alvalue,'')) MACDH, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'EMA50VSEMA200',C.alvalue,'')) EMA50VSEMA200, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'EMA200VSEMA50',C.alvalue,'')) EMA200VSEMA50, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'RSI14VS70',C.alvalue,'')) RSI14VS70, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'RSI14VS30',C.alvalue,'')) RSI14VS30, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'STOVS80',C.alvalue,'')) STOVS80, MAX(DECODE( D.alertcd,'STOVS20',C.alvalue,'')) STOVS20, REGFILEID FROM cfalertdtl C, defalert D WHERE C.alertid=D.autoid group by REGFILEID)B WHERE A.AUTOID=B.REGFILEID
SELECT MAX(DECODE(VARNAME,'WEBWARAMT',VARVALUE,'')) ALERT_FEE, MAX(DECODE(VARNAME,'WEBSMSAMT',VARVALUE,'')) SMS_FEE FROM SYSVAR WHERE VARNAME LIKE '%WEB%'
